mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_KNAME, M.MEMBER_ENAME, M.MEMBER_NO, D.SDEPT_NAME, S.GRADE, S.STUDENT_STATUS FROM STUDENT_INFO S LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.STUDENT_NO=M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN SDEPARTMENT D ON(S.SDEPT_CODE=D.SDEPT_CODE) WHERE S.STUDENT_NO=#{studentNo}

SELECT S.ENROL_TYPE, S.ENROL_DATE, S.ENROL_GRADE, S.ENROL_NO, S.GRADUATED_DATE,S.DEGREE_NO,S.DEGREE_NAME,S.GRADUATED_NO FROM STUDENT_INFO S LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.STUDENT_NO=M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN SDEPARTMENT D ON(S.SDEPT_CODE=D.SDEPT_CODE) WHERE S.STUDENT_NO=#{studentNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_KNAME, M.MEMBER_ENAME, M.MEMBER_NO, D.SDEPT_NAME, S.GRADE, S.STUDENT_STATUS, M.ADDRESS, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE_ONE, M.PHONE_TWO, S.BANK, S.ACCOUNT_NO,S.ACCOUNT_HOLDER, P.PARENTS_NAME, P.PARENTS_RELATION, P.PARENTS_PHONE, P.PARENTS_ADDRESS FROM STUDENT_INFO S LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.STUDENT_NO=M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN SDEPARTMENT D ON(S.SDEPT_CODE=D.SDEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN PARENTS_INFO P ON(S.STUDENT_NO=P.STUDENT_NO) WHERE S.STUDENT_NO=#{studentNo}

SELECT C.COLLEGE_NAME, D.SDEPT_NAME, S.GRADE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_KNAME, S.STUDENT_STATUS FROM STUDENT_INFO S LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.STUDENT_NO=M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN SDEPARTMENT D ON(S.SDEPT_CODE=D.SDEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN COLLEGE C ON(D.COLLEGE_CODE=C.COLLEGE_CODE)
SELECT SDEPT_NAME FROM SDEPARTMENT S LEFT JOIN COLLEGE C ON(S.COLLEGE_CODE=C.COLLEGE_CODE) WHERE C.COLLEGE_NAME = #{college}
SELECT SDEPT_NAME FROM SDEPARTMENT WHERE SDEPT_NAME != '교양학과'
SELECT COLLEGE_NAME FROM COLLEGE WHERE COLLEGE_NAME != '교양학부'
SELECT SDEPT_NAME FROM SDEPARTMENT WHERE SDEPT_NAME != '교양학과'
